active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a ransomware attack on a critical enterprise server, debate whether to wipe and reinstall the OS from scratch or restore from backups. Consider trade-offs in recovery time, data integrity risks, potential for persistent threats, and business continuity impacts. Support arguments with references to NIST SP 800-184.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
